title: The Final Fling 23rd - 25th October 2015, North Devon

posts.content:
North Devon VW Club's Final Fling 2015
23rd-25th October 2015

Now in it's 9th year, the North Devon VW Club are proud to present this years Final Fling event, held at Little Roadway Farm, Woolacombe, North Devon



Admission Prices
£17.50 per adult & £5 per child in advance

£20 per adult and £8 per child on the gate

To book please send payment via paypal to finalfling@live.co.uk , via gift payment (more for the charity) stating how many adults and children you are paying for, and if you are part of a club camping plot

Should you wish to pay via cheque or cash, then please contact Jamie either via email finalfling@live.co.uk or 07447 003939. We will be at a handful of shows throughout the summer too.

Club Camping

As per normal club camping is available, please contact Jamie direct to book the space.

Traders

As per previous years, trading at the Final Fling is available at the cost of normal weekend admission, again contact Jamie for any enquiries

Charity
This year the club has decided to support The Chemotherapy Appeal North Devon, further information is here http://overandabove.org.uk/

Find us on facebook http://www.facebook.com/2015finalfling or contact Jamie Tallin on 07447 003939 or finalfling@live.co.uk for any further information
Only 3 months to go, don't leave it too late to get your advance tickets...........
I fancy this one again - last year was a hoot
Advance ticket sales close on Sunday 18/10/2015, book now to save £2.50 per ticket
